title: Black Screen Problem
body:
http://s18.postimg.org/pjb63uqrd/Screenshot_54.png

Got in a lobby and this happened.

replies.body: The black screen issue you're saying may be due to a network problem failing to connect to the server and download assets.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
